spatial_accuracy.notes: General layout and room adjacency are well-preserved. However, the dining table is oriented incorrectly (perpendicular to plan), and the utility entrance area is slightly widened compared to the original blueprint proportions.

structural_fidelity.notes: Excellent adherence to structural constraints. No measurements or text labels. Roof removed correctly. There is a slight reinterpretation of the kitchen wall opening for the utility area, making it more open than the plan suggests.

furniture_mapping.notes: Furniture placement is highly accurate, including the balcony seating and the specific sink/stove positioning. Points deducted for the dining set rotation and the addition of a TV stand not explicitly detailed in the 2D layout.

aesthetic_quality.notes: Perfect isometric orthographic view. Proper low-poly style with flat shading and no textures. Background is dark and neutral.

detected_errors.description: Dining table and chairs rotated 90 degrees from the orientation shown in the 2D floor plan.
Hallucinated TV stand unit in the living area; structural opening near kitchen/utility area is wider than designed.
